title: Cardiac arrest
Description: CPR being administered during a simulation of cardiac arrest.
Symptoms: Loss of consciousness, abnormal or no breathing
Causes: Coronary artery disease, congenital heart defect, major blood loss, lack of oxygen, very low potassium, heart failure
Prevention: Not smoking, physical activity, maintaining a healthy weight
Frequency: 13 per 10,000 people per year (outside hospital in the US)
